item.title: Mentioned by Marketwire (press release)
item.description:
MEDIA ADVISORY/PHOTO OP: How Can the Government Fix Our Health Care ...
Doctors to Present First Aid Kit to MP Libby Davies. NIAGARA-ON-THE-LAKE, ONTARIO--(Marketwired - July 23, 2013) - With the federal government stepping away from a 2014 Health Accord, health care in Canada needs a shot in the arm - what can we do to make it better? Canadian Doctors for Medicare will be delivering an oversized "First Aid Kit" filled with useful items to Health Critic Libby Davies in the hopes that it can help direct the government to cure what ails our health care system. The Minister of Health ...

item.description:
